description: National institutional capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS (TACAIDS) and Zanzibar AIDS Commission (ZAC) strengthened to effectively lead and coordinate an enhanced, multi-sectoral and quality national response to HIV & AIDS.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities to mainstream action into national policies, plans and strategies on the socio-economic causes and consequences of HIV and the linkage to the health MDG
subproject.description: The UN Joint Programme on HIV/AIDS is to support the National response in Tanzania mainland and Zanzibar to scale up Universal access to prevention, care and treatment and impact mitigation of the HIV epidemic. Also to strengthen the capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS and Zanzibar AIDS Commission in coordination and M& E of the National response.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: UN Joint Programme on HIV&AIDS
